今天，《异形丛生：虫启天降》在Steam上庆祝六周年。你将会获得 [url=https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/563560/view/3267945303130139335]持续一周的双倍经验[/url]，但我们知道你来这里的真正目的。让我们打开这些礼物吧：
[h1]新的战役：32号事故[/h1]
由于异常的放射性水平，在人口密集地区的地下发现了神秘但看似无害的绿色发光宝石。琥珀公司开始到此研究这种超自然的物质。调查结果令人恐惧，且做了无记录处理，也禁止公众知晓。宝石被认为是极其危险的主要由μ子组成的外星物质。其散发的辐射会改变一个大范围内的所有生物结构。
《32号事故》最初于2020年5月和2022年5月在Steam 创意工坊上发布，是一次拥有6个任务的战役，它将两个3个任务的战役结合在一起。陆战队开始探索名为琥珀公司的总部和神秘的建筑群，并面临许多威胁。赏金任务“琥珀综合体”任务，其是将前三个任务合并为一个。

[h1]收藏：武器，装备，和虫群百科[/h1]
正如在添加收藏品界面时就承诺的那样，虫群百科重返啦，比以往任何时候都更好！通过在战场上杀死异形来解锁关于异形的统计数据、提示和短篇故事。插件还可以创建自己的虫群百科条目，或向现有条目添加内容。
随着虫群百科的改进，将出现一个新的界面，用于选择使用网格的武器，旨在加快寻找高级武器和帮助肌肉记忆。现在通过升级解锁武器，还可以让你访问它们的情况说明书，包括关于射程、伤害等的精确统计数据。
[img]{STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/27357479/beb87cdc025c8788a1fda2bb5763846faf0d56ff.jpg[/img]
[h1]地图竞赛2023：“Boss大战”[/h1]
今年，我们将举办我们的第一届年度社区地图竞赛，还有什么比在年底时开始更好的呢？今年的主题是[b]Boss大战[/b]
创建一个包含boss战斗的任务或简短的战役——与一些陆战队必须克服的大Boss的脚本相遇。boss会是一个异形，一群异形，还是全新的东西？任务将在哪里进行？陆战队为什么在那里？所有这些问题以及更多的问题，都是你在未来几个月必须考虑的事情。
或者，如果你有更好的主意，就继续做吧！AS:RD的地图竞赛主题是可选的。
参赛作品必须带有[b]BossFight2023[/b]。比赛今天开始，8月1日结束。奖品包括独特的游戏奖章。如果你需要帮助，点击 [url=https://steamcommunity.com/app/563560/discussions/1/]Modding / Mapping Help and Tips[/url] 论坛。
[h1]Year in Review[/h1]
In 2022, marines killed 985,092,535 aliens in official missions and an additional 56,154,088 aliens in missions from the Steam Workshop. 575,108 players tried Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop for the first time last year. Including returning players, marines spent 1,590,427 hours in 17,674,520 missions. 10,947 players took part in at least one of the first six seasons of Heroes of the Interstellar Armed Forces by playing on participating community dedicated servers. December 6th saw the highest player count of the year, with 16,080 players logging - over three times the average. Alien Swarm: Reactive Drop was played from 85 different countries in 2022.
Killing that many aliens takes a lot of ammunition - you fired 5,303,484,897 bullets last year - that's about half as many bullets as are manufactured in the entire world each year - and that doesn't even count weapons that don't fire bullets. Marines also fired 232,409,109 shotgun shells, deployed 11,307,827 mines, and used 104,722,710 grenades. You launched 274,157,391 missiles and fired flamethrowers for a total of 86 million seconds, not to mention using chainsaws for over 1.4 billion seconds. (That's over 45 years!)
It wasn't just handheld guns and explosives, either. Last year, marines deployed: [list] [*]905,280 doses of Adrenaline [*]3,890,668 ammo stashes [*]1,501,644 X33 Damage Amplifiers [*]10,282,887 IAF Heal Beacons [*]3,783,431 IAF Advanced Sentry Guns [*]523,062 IAF Incendiary Sentry Guns [*]261,255 IAF Freeze Sentry Guns [*]260,971 IAF High Velocity Sentry Cannons [*]3,822,448 IAF Tesla Sentry Coils [/list] Marines also brought 105,866 flashlights along on missions.
You've destroyed 2,147,368 pieces of Biomass in 2022 since we started tracking it in late August. Between when we started tracking alien deaths in mid-June and the end of 2022, marines have killed: [list] [*]582,811,354 Drones [*]28,956,762 Parasites [*]27,244,232 Xenomites [*]16,772,012 Rangers [*]15,897,059 Eggs [*]14,968,328 Buzzers [*]11,929,443 Grubs [*]2,940,237 Harvesters [*]2,863,582 Boomers [*]2,190,344 Menders [*]1,945,290 Shieldbugs [*]1,851,113 Mortarbugs [*]577,023 Antlions [*]186,411 Headcrab Zombies [*]3,489 Queens [/list]
[h1]以防你忘记了[/h1]
以下是自上一周年以来更新的一些亮点: [list] [*]创意工坊的插件现在可以包含视频，同时任务可以定义自己的简报背景视频，甚至在简报期间将部分世界作为背景。 [*]我们通过了Steam Deck认证！这款游戏在Steam平台上运行得很好，Linux和主机玩家也看到了改进。 [*]现在你可以通过帮助游戏开发，为Steam社区中心做出贡献，或参与一个赛季的星际武装部队英雄来获得勋章。 [*]在许多任务中使用的缓慢打开的拱顶门现在有更准确的碰撞数据，允许你踏过或通过部分打开的门射击。 [*]全新的任务选择界面包括支持赏金任务和新的“无尽”任务。 [*]我们添加了一个高级设置菜单和一个高级音频设置菜单。 [*]重新启动任务不再需要加界面。 [/list]
[h1]本次更新的其他改动[/h1]
[h2]战役[/h2] [list] [*][b]第9800区：荒原之地[/b] 修复了 一个收获主在最后的挑战介绍场景，被卡在出口的问题。 [*][b]蒂拉鲁斯-5：北极渗透[/b] 修复了 任务启动时，上方的爪虫出现后又迅速消失的问题。 [*][b]蒂拉鲁斯-5：新特医院[/b] 使警报听起来更响。 [*][b]拉娜的逃亡：拉娜的大桥[/b] 对照明，渲染和寻路进行了显著的性能优化。 [*][b]Lana's Escape: Lana's Sewer:[/b] The radioactive barrels in the arena deal more damage to menders. [*][b]偏执症：始料不及[/b] 修复了 榴弹发射器瞄准的错误。 [*][b]偏执症：敌对之地[/b] 修复了 榴弹发射器瞄准的错误。 [*][b]Nam Humanum: Platform XVII:[/b] Fixed bot marines refusing to stand on the moving platform. [*][b]燃料库：[/b] 移除了 无形天花板横梁的碰撞。 [*]All official missions have been given custom loading screens. [/list]
[h2]武器[/h2] [list] [*][b]ML30激光地雷：[/b] 改进了 投掷动画的网络预测。 [*][b]CR18 Freeze Grenades:[/b] Freezing now kills buzzers, and marines can be frozen in Deathmatch mode. [*][b]M868火焰装置：[/b] 修复了 燃料箱只提供一半的弹药装填的问题。 [*][b]链锯：[/b] 机器人现在在更合理的范围内使用这种武器。 [*][b]TG-05 毒气手雷：[/b] 更新了物品的外观，以帮助区分它与其他类型的手榴弹。 [*][b]Flechette Gun (hidden):[/b] This gun has a new appearance and now fires timed sticky explosives (the same ones Combine Hunters fire) rather than auto-aimed rockets. Now fires directly at the aim location rather than parallel to the ground. [*][b]Ricochet Rifle (hidden):[/b] This gun has a new appearance and no longer requires the secondary trigger to be held to bounce shots. Instead, holding the secondary trigger switches the gun to a shotgun-like burst fire mode. Bounced bullets can now hit the marine that fired them. [*]修复了 哨兵塔在空闲时，角度不同步的扫描动画问题。 [*]修复了 碰撞检查代码中的不一致，最明显的是与机器人陆战队和投射物有关。 [*]Fixed a bug sometimes preventing the use of off-hand items on controller. [*]Auto-aim weapons such as the 22A7-Z Prototype Assault Rifle and the S23A SynTek Autogun now apply their bonuses in first and third person. [/list]
[h2]杂项[/h2] [list] [*]Fixed an issue where server-triggered achievements such as speed runs and Outstanding Execution could be skipped due to momentary packet loss. [*]修复了 异形试图向已死亡目投掷一个实体时导致的崩溃。 [*]修复了 当屏幕下拉菜单打开时崩溃的问题。 [*]修复了 游戏指导员建议陆战队员焊接一扇门时，门已经损坏到无法打开或关闭的地步。 [*]修复了 陆战队员被取消选择在大厅重新启动奖金任务，是通过投票开始的。 [*]聊天面板现在可以在单人游戏中打开（用于自定义挑战）。 [*]改进了 死亡竞赛地图中的机器人。他们应该更少卡住，在更合理的时间，现在会自动加入如果你开始单人死亡竞赛地图。 [*]修复了 游戏教练给出关于如何在死亡模式中重生的错误信息，并整理了HUD上的提示。 [*]Improved bots' ability to avoid danger and flank shieldbugs. [*]Bots are now much less likely to teleport in front of a player. [*]You can flush the toilets in official missions. [*]Marines no longer always face east when starting a mission in first or third person. [*]Fixed some tooltips being too small to comfortably read. [*]When selecting a text input with Steam Big Picture enabled, the on-screen keyboard will open. [*]Added a mission recording list and an option to automatically record missions. [*]The game now updates its state more frequently during slow motion. [*]Performing an override on a locked computer now always goes to the menu rather than downloading critical data or doing nothing. [*]When finishing a bonus or deathmatch map, the game now selects a default next mission. [*]The Leadership skill can now be triggered by any officer within range, not just the officer with the most points in the skill. [*]Added a visible and audible indication for when Leadership affects damage dealt or taken. [*]Challenges can now set "required_on_client" "1" if they wish to include assets, which will cause the workshop addon to be automatically downloaded when the challenge is activated. [*]Challenges can now be marked for use in deathmatch with "allowed_mode" "deathmatch". Challenges that are able to be used in both deathmatch and cooperative play can additionally specify "allowed_mode" "coop". [/list]
[h2]地图[/h2] [list] [*]添加了 npc_crow、npc_pigeon 和 npc_seagull。 [*]Added npc_combine_s, npc_combine_shotgun, and npc_combine_elite. These soldiers lack the "swarm sense" of aliens, instead relying on sight, sound, and information from their squad. Mappers can optionally add info_node_hint to mark spots with cover for the Combine soldiers to use. [*]Added npc_zombine, with mapper-configurable grenades. [*]Added npc_hunter, for use with other Combine NPCs. [*]Added npc_strider, npc_combinegunship, and npc_combinedropship for use in cinematics. [*]asw_colonist is now randomized using a wider range of appearances. Set the skin number to change the color of their clothing. [*]asw_env_shake 现在可以用来标记，以绕过用户设置（添加了一个新的convar，用于禁用[i]所有[/i]抖动，而不管这个标志）。 [*]添加了 env_headcrabcanister。 [*]添加了 script_intro。 [*]一个新的材质代理，LanguagePreference，可以用来根据查看者的语言偏好来改变纹理。 例如： [code]UnlitGeneric { $basetexture "example/translated_texture_english"
Proxies { LanguagePreference { default "example/translated_texture_english" schinese "example/translated_texture_schinese" french "example/translated_texture_french" resultvar "$basetexture" } } }[/code] [*]TileGen现在期望为-alldetail模式构建房间（世界笔刷变成func_detail，名称以structure_开头的func_brush变成世界笔刷）。 [*]改进了 rd_tilegen_instance的随机化。 [*]rd_tilegen_instance现在搜索reactivedrop/tilegen/instances，而不是reactivedrop/tilegen/instance/ThemeName。 [*]TileGen现在在将地图发送到VBSP之前将实例压平，允许TileGen房间集在vpk或车间中分发。这也意味着rd_tilegen_instance可以在实例中使用。 [*]TileGen地图现在使用toolsskybox作为关卡封条，允许使用light_environment和light_directional。 [*]asw_vehicle_jeep现在可以使用了。没有附加组件的可用车辆是《半条命2》中的沙丘车（models/buggy.mdl，scripts/vehicles/jeep_test.txt），允许一个驾驶员；以及《半条命2：第二章》中的肌肉车（models/vehicle.mdl, scripts/vehicles/jalopy.txt），允许一名司机和一名乘客。 [*]trigger_asw_button_area现在可以使用自定义文本覆盖UI提示。 [*]trigger_asw_computer_area has been made more customizable: [list] [*]Mail and news articles can now optionally end with an image. Use Image, ImageWide, and ImageTall to add an image to a news file. For mail, use MailBody1Image, etc. [*]Reactor status can be controlled via an input on the computer area, as an alternative to the old method of having an objective with a specific icon. [*]Weather, reactor status, and stock market info can now be customized with keyvalues files. Additionally, the current temperature is no longer randomized every time the weather report is opened. [/list] [*]buildcubemaps命令现在需要启用sv_cheats。 [*]func_asw_fade now ignores collisions with grenades by default. [*]Added asw_weapon_ar2 and asw_ammo_ar2. The Pulse Rifle can only refill ammo from these specific ammo packs and cannot use generic ammo stashes. [*]Added asw_ammo_grenade_launcher, asw_ammo_sniper_rifle, and asw_ammo_heavy_rifle. [*]Added info_marine_hint_dynamic, which can be assigned a parent and moved. [/list]
[h2]VScript[/h2] [list] [*]为陆战队增加了一个新的方法:SetMarineRolls，它允许地图和挑战改变单个陆战队是否可以跳跃。 [*]asw_vehicle_jeep有方法用相应的Get*方法覆盖它的camera, setcameracontrol, SetCameraPitch, SetCameraDist和SetCameraHeight。设置负值会使车辆使用全局设置。 [*]asw_vehicle_jeep有一些方法可以查询车内人员:maxpassenger()、GetDriver()和GetPassenger(seat)。 [*]asw_vehicle_jeep有方法来检索统计数据:GetSpeed, GetMaxSpeed（英里每小时），GetRPM, GetThrottle, HasBoost和BoostTimeLeft。 [/list]
欢迎参加《异形丛生：虫启天降》的生日！！
今天，欢迎参加《异形丛生：虫启天降》在Steam上庆祝六周年！这里有一个星期的双倍经验，两个新的战役，和一些其他的好东西来庆祝。
